citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1715 hrs on
02/11/2015. The licensee informed the inspector via phone that she was stuck on a highway which was shut down
for several hours due to a crash.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1715 hrs on
02/11/2015.  The licensee informed the inspector via phone that she was stuck on a highway which was shut down
for several hours due to a crash.
